comment: she is a very hard grader and it not that clear. i made an A in 1101 with ease and busted it to pull a C in here. also changed syllabus at end

I had a 4.0 & made A+ on ALL my college papers but the highest grade I received on a paper in her class was 83. She marks wrong anything that she would have written differently.VERY HARD grader & unclear what she expects.Went to the writing lab for all but my 1st paper but didnt improve my grade much. She is funny but would not take again EVER!!!!

Very Harsh Grader! Had to work very hard to get my B. Went to the writing center for each paper and only made high C's on each. She's a nice lady and she knows her stuff but dont take if you arent a skilled writer. Paper descriptions are a bit vague. Interesting teacher for lecture, enjoyed class just not my grade. Not many ppl made A's.
Hard grader. She has a passion for writing and expects you to as well. Definitely has class favorites. It was a chore to go to this class for me. Very strict with MLA.
this definitely wasn't an easy A, but it is possible. She grades very hard, but i thought she was all around fair. she is very funny and i enjoyed her class... lots of in class discussions.

Horrible. I had to work so hard to get a C in this class. She definitely has class favorites, and she is an impossible grader. I literally cried after seeing her mocking remarks and harsh grading on my papers that I worked very hard on. I have always passed my english classes with A's except for this one. STAY AWAY. No wonder she doesn't have tenur

Her class is really fun to attend which is good since she takes attendance before every class. She grades hard though, her class is NOT easy. You have to work hard to make a good grade. Most classes are just discussion and kind of pointless but it's better then having to sit in lecture!

She's a tough grader and expects madatory attendance (less than 5 absences) but I learned a lot from this class.  She's serious when it comes to assignments, but most days are just discussions the full hour and fifteen minutes.  Highly recommended if English interests you!
Mad attractive teacher! Very chill. Hard grader, but wants you to be a good writer. Great teacher. Favorite class this semester.

The class was interesting;we always had great discussions but she is stuck on herself..you will hear about her novels a bunch.She grades papers based on her own opinions instead of the actual material you have provided. She will bash your descriptive writing and make you feel dumb with her comments she leaves on ur paper.

Great class, never boring, makes you think about tough subjects. I'm a terrible writer and was nervous about the essays however, she was very helpful and I was able to pull off an A.  She is a Fun teacher and a great writer.

She's a writer so she expects you to take papers seriously. She likes when you participate in class discussions and won't hold it against you if you don't agree with her. If you put effort into your papers and try to learn from her grading, you will get an A no problem. Loved her even though we disagreed. I learned A LOT about my writing ability.

Very difficult for an 1101 class. Stuck on herself and her writing abilities - expects the impossible from class. Does not give A, thinks her Bs are the same as an A in other classes. Do not take her.

I loved her class! We always had great, interactive class discussions about interesting things and she always kept things fun! Everyone should take her class, she's really nice and easy to talk to as well.

She has said herself:"Getting a B in my Class is Like getting an A in any other English class". So take it as you please.Definitly not easy but it's not impossible either.Also, there is never a dull moment in the class it was always intresting doing activities and having discusions.Nice lady but very opnionated so don't take her if easily offended.
Teacher was a great teacher. Enjoyed class lectures. however, she grades VERY hard. picky about little things. do not take her if you struggle with english or want an easy A.
If you want to make an A do not take her class. 4 research papers that are graded very hard and are worth 80% of your grade.

I love her! She does grade papers extremely hard, but she's so helpful! She tells you what she wants in the papers hand helps you out with MLA citations. Attendance is mandatory, but her class is interesting because she has discussions on real life stuff. If you have an A or a B you're not required to take the final!

Very good professor. She cares about you and what your grade is. In class discussions play a big part in writing your paper and she sometimes proof reads your paper before you have to turn it in. Go to class, the papers are based on the work done in class. Tough class but do your work and you'll have a B, put in a good effort and you'll have an A.

She is really cool. I got B's on all of my papers and they were really broad topics so I had a lot of room to write freely. She does grade tough being a writer but she will help you with anything if you just ask her. I got a C+ because the journals got me in the end so read your textbook. Overall, Take her class!

Great Prof. Your final grade truly reflects your effort. Read your text book assignments or u might have a pop quiz. Tough grader but im a much better writer cus of it. Very fair, understanding, and down to earth. Easy to get along with. Grade consists of 4 papers & portfolio grade. Do your portfolio! Every1 with a B or higher was exempt from final

She is a tough grader, but she is very fair as well. Go to class to get the easy portfolio points that help your grade. Very few A's are given out, but if you work, you may be able to get one, if not a B.
She only grades 4 or 5 papers. Gives easy grades on portfolios. SUPER HOT!

good teacher, kinda hard but still good. really helpful, but a little extreme sometimes. she's a writer so really tough grader. she doesnt make you come to class but you wont do well unless you come and do the assignments that are done in class to get those grades.

Funny and very nice. Grades harder than some professors but she is very helpful. Not too much homework other thatn occasional textbook readings. I would recomend her as this was one of my favorite classes.
I would avoid this teacher at all cost. Your living out her dream of becoming a writer. Grades very hard.
